site_name: Westhorpe Gardens And Mills GroveLondonNW4 2TU
description: Non-material amendments to planning permission reference 18/7495/FUL dated 01/09/20 for 'Demolition of existing 102 residential dwellings across 6 x 3 storey block of flats, 2 storey terraced houses and Westhorpe Cottage. Redevelopment for 251 residential units which includes 79 units to be provided for retirement living, across 9 no. part 4/5/6 and 7 storey blocks and 15 no. 3 storey houses with ancillary shared spaces including community cafe within the retirement block and associated parking and landscaping.' Amendments include: Isolation of approximately 30sqm of the site to allow a future planning application for a substation to come forward within; Minor re-alignment of the proposed footway to the north of the future substation site; Relocation of two proposed trees with one proposed tree to the west of the future substation site; Additional planting surrounding the future substation site
